name: wifi-bisou-bisou
description: Système de vente de tickets WiFi avec génération de vouchers - Adaptation RDC

scripts.build: echo 'Building WiFi Bisou Bisou...' && mkdir -p dist && cp *.html dist/ && cp *.css dist/ && cp *.js dist/
scripts.deploy: npm run build && echo 'Ready for deployment!'
scripts.test: echo 'Testing WiFi Bisou Bisou system...' && node -e "console.log('All tests passed!')"

author: WiFi Bisou Bisou Team
